title: How to Make Easy Quesadillas

steps.headline: Gather the ingredients.
steps.description:
You'll need:
2 tortillas
Butter
Shredded cheese
Assorted toppings (optional).

steps.headline: Butter two tortillas on one side of each.
Cover one tortilla with your favorite shredded cheese and put the other tortilla on top of it.
Spread toppings such as salsa, sour cream etc...
Gather your ingredients.
steps.description:
You will need:
2 tortillas
Leftover cooked chicken pieces (from last night's meal)
Shredded cheese.

steps.headline: Microwave the quesadillas for 1 minute.
steps.description: Also heat up the chicken for 1 minute.

steps.headline: Cut the quesadillas in half.
steps.description: Sprinkle with cheese and place the chicken inside.

text:
Cheese quesadillas Gather the ingredients. You'll need:
2 tortillas
Butter
Shredded cheese
Assorted toppings (optional). Butter two tortillas on one side of each.  Cover one tortilla with your favorite shredded cheese and put the other tortilla on top of it.  Microwave for exactly 1 minute.  Spread toppings such as salsa, sour cream etc...  Chicken and cheese quesadillas Gather your ingredients. You will need:
2 tortillas
Leftover cooked chicken pieces (from last night's meal)
Shredded cheese. Microwave the quesadillas for 1 minute. Also heat up the chicken for 1 minute. Cut the quesadillas in half. Sprinkle with cheese and place the chicken inside. Microwave for 1 minute. It's ready to serve.
sentences:
You'll need:
2 tortillas
Butter
Shredded cheese
Assorted toppings (optional).
Butter two tortillas on one side of each.
Cover one tortilla with your favorite shredded cheese and put the other tortilla on top of it.
Spread toppings such as salsa, sour cream etc...  Chicken and cheese quesadillas Gather your ingredients.

You will need:
2 tortillas
Leftover cooked chicken pieces (from last night's meal)
Shredded cheese.
Also heat up the chicken for 1 minute.
Sprinkle with cheese and place the chicken inside.
